transcript: the most miserable place in business is 1 to three million it's the swamp and the reason for that is because you don't have enough money to get leverage but you need leverage to make more money you're probably in a period where you have to work double time like you have to do your job and you have to do the next version of your job and some of that is getting more output out of the team you have as well it's also setting that as the culture of like we need to get through this hump and you position it as a benefit for them as like you will have career growth if this company grows like you will be able to have people underneath of you who report to you you will your career will go up you'll gain en title you gain in pay if we can do these things
